fields.label: Does your AML/CTF program comply with the requirements of Part 4.3 regarding customers who are domestic or foreign companies?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls designed to enable you to be reasonably satisfied that the company exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to verify the company's existence.

fields.label: Does your program include systems to ensure compliance with beneficial owner requirements as specified in Part 4.12?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to identify and verify beneficial owners.

fields.label: Does your business have customers that are Domestic Companies?
Does your business collect the full name of the company as registered by ASIC?
Does your business collect the full address of the company's registered office?
Does your business collect the full address of the company's principal place of business (if any)?
Does your business collect the ACN issued to the company?
Does your business collect whether the company is registered by ASIC as a proprietary or public company?
For proprietary companies, does your business collect the name of each director of the company?
Does your business have customers that are Registered Foreign Companies?
Does your business collect the full name of the foreign company as registered by ASIC?
Does your business collect the full address of the company's registered office in Australia?
Does your business collect the company's principal place of business in Australia or the name and address of its local agent?
Does your business collect the ARBN issued to the company?
Does your business collect the country in which the company was formed, incorporated or registered?
Does your business collect whether the company is registered as a private or public company by the relevant foreign body?
For private foreign companies, does your business collect the name of each director of the company?
Does your business have customers that are Unregistered Foreign Companies?
Does your business collect the full name of the unregistered foreign company?
Does your business collect the country in which the company was formed, incorporated or registered?
Does your business collect the identification number issued by the relevant foreign registration body?
Does your business collect the full address of the company in its country of formation as registered by the foreign body?
Does your business collect whether it is registered as a private or public company?
For private unregistered foreign companies, does your business collect the name of each director?
If not registered by a foreign body, does your business collect the address of the company's principal place of business in its country of formation?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional KYC information relating to the company's existence should be collected?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to determine if additional KYC information is required.

fields.label: Does your business verify the minimum information required for Domestic Companies?
Specifically, does your business verify the full name as registered by ASIC?
Specifically, does your business verify whether it is a proprietary or public company?
Specifically, does your business verify the ACN?
Does your business verify the minimum information required for Registered Foreign Companies?
Specifically, does your business verify the full name as registered by ASIC?
Specifically, does your business verify the private/public status and the ARBN?
Does your business verify the minimum information required for Unregistered Foreign Companies?
Specifically, does your business verify the full name and foreign registration identification number?
Specifically, does your business verify whether it is a private or public company?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional verification of company information is required?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to determine if additional verification is necessary.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to ML/TF risk when determining additional collection and verification requirements for companies?
fields.detail-label: Describe how ML/TF risk is considered in this determination.

fields.label: Does your program utilize the simplified company verification procedure for domestic listed or licensed companies?
Does your business confirm company status via a search of the relevant domestic stock exchange?
Does your business confirm company status via public documents issued by the company?
Does your business confirm company status via a search of the relevant ASIC database?
Does your business confirm company status via a search of the records of a relevant regulator?
Does your program include systems to determine how to verify the existence of a foreign listed public company?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to verify the existence of foreign listed public companies.

fields.label: Is company verification based as far as possible on reliable and independent documentation or electronic data?
Does your business use disclosure certificates to verify beneficial owner information where permitted?
Does your program include systems to determine whether to rely on a disclosure certificate for a foreign company where information is not available?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems for determining reliance on disclosure certificates for foreign companies.

fields.label: Does your business consider ML/TF risk and jurisdiction when deciding to rely on a disclosure certificate for a foreign company?
fields.detail-label: Describe how you consider jurisdiction and risk in this decision.

fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems to respond to discrepancies arising during the verification of company information?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls for responding to discrepancies.

groups.title: Part 4.3: Companies
groups.description: Applicable customer identification procedure with respect to companies.

groups.title: General Systems and Controls
groups.description: Risk-based systems regarding company existence and beneficial ownership.

groups.title: Collection of Information
groups.description: Requirements for collecting minimum KYC information based on company type.

groups.title: Domestic Companies (Collection)
groups.description: Collection requirements for companies registered with ASIC.

groups.title: Registered Foreign Companies (Collection)
groups.description: Collection requirements for foreign companies registered in Australia.

groups.title: Unregistered Foreign Companies (Collection)
groups.description: Collection requirements for foreign companies not registered in Australia.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Procedures to verify the identity and existence of company customers.

groups.title: Domestic Companies (Verification)
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements for Domestic Companies.

groups.title: Registered Foreign Companies (Verification)
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements for Registered Foreign Companies.

groups.title: Unregistered Foreign Companies (Verification)
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements for Unregistered Foreign Companies.

groups.title: Simplified Company Verification Procedure
groups.description: Optional procedures for listed public companies or licensed entities.

groups.title: Methods and Discrepancies
groups.description: Acceptable sources for verification and handling data conflicts.
